messages.message:
General Q Re AI Hub:
 Are there any options within AI Hub to 'remember' the doc(s) or have a specific App for it ? for example:
• Underwriting guides
• Motor trade guidelines
• Expense policies
Internal chat bot that all (relevant) employees can query for their routine tasks rather than upload those massive documents each time individually ?
cc : @Paul
we don't have this capability now

@Pramod Munemanik, well not out of the box but I think Vineeth mentioned this (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1687848022688969?thread_ts=1687788748.893489&cid=C06FA6A23) which might be useful?
@Kerry - is it on the roadmap? I know AXA will be very keen for this and would be good to get an indication on what our plans are so I can manage their expectations accordingly.
This is not on the roadmap for now -- there are other higher priority items. cc @Clemens
We should have a PFR raised (if not already) and provide insights. The EPD team can then prioritize against other roadmap items

We do have a ticket tracking this - https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-269?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiMmJkZWVmYTI5ZWRkNGY3NWI0NjA0YzFmYjNkZjI0NDAiLCJwIjoiaiJ9

Please add any insights from customers here
